channel.title: thebeachboys on Giovanni Marigi - Personal Page

item.title: But long enough to bloom
item.description: I know all the songs of two bands: The Beach Boys and Jamiroquai. I grew up with the former’s vinyl records at home and I have always found their music to be a work of art of virtuosity and creativity. And then I discovered the music of Jamiroquai in my teenage years. In many ways I have always compared them to The Beach Boys, for their musical experimentation, for the joy of their melodies.
